comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script)
 [https://wilcode.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwilcode.com%2F)
### Comment
> Dear AdGuard Support Team,
> I am writing to formally request a review and removal of my website, wilcode.com, from your "Dangerous/Phishing" blacklist (Report ID: wilcode.com).
> This website is the official professional portfolio for my web development agency, Wilcode Development. It is a static informational site used to showcase my work to potential clients.
> I believe this flag is a false positive for the following reasons:
> No Data Collection: The site does not contain login forms, registration pages, or any fields requesting sensitive user data, financial information, or credentials.
> Safe Content: The platform consists exclusively of project descriptions, images, and company contact information.
> Business Legitimacy: We are a verified development agency and do not engage in any fraudulent or deceptive activities.
> It is possible that this flag was the result of a malicious report by competitors or an automated error. I kindly ask that you re-scan the domain to verify its safety and remove the warning for your users.
> Site Details:
> URL: https://wilcode.com
> IP Address: 69.46.29.54
> Category: Phishing (Incorrectly identified)
> Thank you for your time and assistance in resolving this matter.

### Screenshots

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

please wait for next extension update,meanwhile you can add below filters in user rules
```adb
||a.trbcdn.net/lib/release/web/*/ad-sdk.js
||iptv2021.com/api/*/ads-banners$domain=russia-tv.online
russia-tv.online##.overflow-hidden:has(> div[class="h-full w-full"]:empty)
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: lookerstudio.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://lookerstudio.google.com/u/2/reporting/a0621a56-062e-44d5-82ca-858234d8d526/page/p_npsj2bh8yd/edit](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Flookerstudio.google.com%2Fu%2F2%2Freporting%2Fa0621a56-062e-44d5-82ca-858234d8d526%2Fpage%2Fp_npsj2bh8yd%2Fedit) ### Comment > El navegador Edge se cierra automáticamente o a veces pega por completo el computador y se cae la página apareciendo el mensaje de error de "STATUS_ACCESS_VIOLATION". > Sucede en cualquier página del navegador. > Creo que puede ser la extensión porque cuando la desactivo el problema no sucede y al volverla a activar comienza a pasar el error de nuevo. ``` Username: @yusep3012 ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/qnjz2jm51u88s40cc0kgow040ookcw42uy67z14new.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/75r6de7e9t8o4cw8wc4cc8cw000g0kcs4luwbtysis.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser Extension v5.2.700.1 MV2 System version: | `Windows 11` Browser: | Edge Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (2880) Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist

Language-specific:
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese Filters last update: | December 21, 2025 at 09:14 Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Other extensions used: | `AdGuard AdBlocker, File Icons for GitHub and Git, JSON Viewer, Lighthouse, Loom - Screen Recorder & Screen Capture, Picture-in-Picture Extension, React Developer Tools, Redux DevTools, Tango - Document and Auto..., Wappalyzer - Technology prof ..., YouTube NonStop` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.2.700.1&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=2&browser=edge&filters=2.3.4.9.208&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=2880&stealth.block_trackers=true&filters_last_update=2025-12-21T09%3A14%3A58)

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/FilteringDev/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
